| Improve this Doc View Source

RankViewModel()

Initializes a new instance of the RankViewModel class, setting up the CurrentUser, RankRepository and RankList. It also initializes the ResetCommand and UpdateCommand.

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

GetRanks()

Asynchronous method to get ranks data from the rank repository using current user's authentication token. If retrieval is successful, updates the rank list with response data, else, sets an error message.

Declaration
public async Task GetRanks()
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task
| Improve this Doc View Source

ResetRankList()

Asynchronously resets the rank list. If the reset is successful it updates the rank order and sets a success message, if not it sets a fail message with the status code and response message. In case of any exceptions, it sets a failure message containing the exception details.

Declaration
public async Task ResetRankList()
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task
| Improve this Doc View Source

The text of the message.
System.String color

The color of the message.
| Improve this Doc View Source

SetRankOrder()

Asynchronously sets the rank order of players based on their scores in descending order. Assigns a rank number and color to each player. Fill the RankList with such ordered ranks.

Declaration
public async Task SetRankOrder()
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task
| Improve this Doc View Source

UpdateData()

Asynchronously updates the data by setting the rank order and a success message indicating that the rank list is refreshed.

Declaration

Returns
